div.p: No.836, p. 1042, unit 109, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.
Document is a circular sent to the heads of 14 branches. Chief Secretary's Office,

I have the honor to inform you that with a view of enabling members of the Public Service who are also members of the Military Forces to attend the Easter course of training commencing on Thursday, 2nd April and terminating on Tuesday, 7th April next, the Honorable the Premier directs that in all cases where compatible with the proper discharge of public business the necessary leave of absence may be granted and I have to request that the necessary steps may be taken to give effect to that instruction as regards your branch of this Department.
